game.name: Sunshine Burgers
game.description:
Summer has just reached and we all need to get ready for it. Yes, this is the time of the year when you enjoy having the summer special specific food and drinks. Everyone seems to be crazy for one of the most popular summer desserts – Ice Cream and, of course, the extremely delicious fast food item – the delicious homemade grill burgers. Like many others, I am also a big fan of the tasty burgers and I would feel proud saying that no one can prepare this scrumptious recipe perfectly than my father since he is truly an expert chef. 

In this brand new cooking game for girls, we have tried to highlight to share the perfect recipe of burgers, which you would surely want to follow while trying it out on your own at your home. Sunshine Burgers is a wonderful kitchen game full of fun and thrill. Follow the guidelines properly in order to complete the goal of the game. Get started with arranging all the necessary ingredients and tools in the kitchen of this free online cooking game for girls and boys. 

You will be provided with the indications to make your job easier. Take a bowl and add mince to it first. Then add some basil and brown pepper to the bowl. After that, add some beaten eggs to the bowl. Find out spoon in the kitchen and use it stir the mixture. Keep dropping the meat mixture on the cutting board with the help of spoon until it finishes. To make the centre of each drop patty, press it with the spoon. Dip the patty into the flour using tong. Then dip it into beaten egg and then into the crushed corn flakes. Turn on the stove and put a pan with some oil on it. Toast all the patties on it. Prepare your burger and serve it to your friends!
